required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety and Efficacy of Divalproex Sodium Extended-Release Tablets in Migraine Prophylaxis: A Study in Adolescents
clinical_study.official_title: Phase III, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Multi-Center Study Designed to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Prophylactic Depakote ER in the Treatment of Adolescent Migraine

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Depakote ER is safe and effective in the reduction of occurrence of migraine headaches in adolescents.

primary_outcome.measure: Reduction from baseline in 4-week migraine headache rate

secondary_outcome.measure: Migraine headache rate in last 4 weeks of study
Percent of subjects with > 75% reduction in migraine headache rate
